languages.text: "После того, как мы переспали, я сообщил об этом в отчете. И получил приказ "укрепить доверие Вольного Торговца". {n}С каждым словом в голосе Соломона нарастает агрессия, словно он накручивает сам себя.{/n} "Мне поручили быть возле тебя, быть твоим конфидентом. Что же, я сумел завоевать твое доверие, не так ли?"

"After we slept together, I sent a report up the chain of command. Then, the order came in: maintain the Rogue Trader's trust." {n}Aggression builds up in Solomorne's voice with every word he says, as though he were deliberately riling himself up.{/n} "My assignment was to stay at your side and become your confidant. Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"
languages.original_text: "После того, как мы переспали, я сообщил об этом в отчете. И получил приказ "укрепить доверие Вольного Торговца". {n}С каждым словом в голосе Соломона нарастает агрессия, словно он накручивает сам себя.{/n} "Мне поручили быть возле тебя, быть твоим конфидентом. Что же, я сумел завоевать твое доверие, не так ли?"

Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"

languages.text: 「一夜を共に過ごした後、上層部に報告したんだ。すると指令が下された。『ローグトレーダーの信頼を維持せよ』と」{n}ソロモーンの声には言葉を重ねるごとに攻撃的な響きが増していく。まるで自分自身をわざと怒らせているかのようだった。{/n}「俺の任務は、お前のそばにいて、信頼を勝ち取ることだった。まあ、信頼を得るって点では、上手くやったと言えるんじゃないか？」
languages.original_text: "After we slept together, I sent a report up the chain of command. Then, the order came in: maintain the Rogue Trader's trust." {n}Aggression builds up in Solomorne's voice with every word he says, as though he were deliberately riling himself up.{/n} "My assignment was to stay at your side and become your confidant. Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"

traits.locale_text: 「一夜を共に過ごした後、上層部に報告したんだ。すると指令が下された。『ローグトレーダーの信頼を維持せよ』と」{n}ソロモーンの声には言葉を重ねるごとに攻撃的な響きが増していく。まるで自分自身をわざと怒らせているかのようだった。{/n}「俺の任務は、お前のそばにいて、信頼を勝ち取ることだった。まあ、信頼を得るって点では、上手くやったと言えるんじゃないか？」

languages.text: "Nachdem wir miteinander geschlafen hatten, habe ich einen Bericht die Befehlskette nach oben geschickt. Daraufhin kam der Befehl: Behaltet das Vertrauen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}." {n}Mit jedem Wort wird Solomornes Stimme aggressiver, als wolle er sich absichtlich in Rage reden.{/n} "Mein Auftrag lautete, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben und Euer Vertrauen zu gewinnen. Nun, das habe ich wohl erfolgreich zustande gebracht, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "After we slept together, I sent a report up the chain of command. Then, the order came in: maintain the Rogue Trader's trust." {n}Aggression builds up in Solomorne's voice with every word he says, as though he were deliberately riling himself up.{/n} "My assignment was to stay at your side and become your confidant. Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem wir miteinander geschlafen hatten, habe ich einen Bericht die Befehlskette nach oben geschickt. Daraufhin kam der Befehl: Behaltet das Vertrauen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}." {n}Mit jedem Wort wird Solomornes Stimme aggressiver, als wolle er sich absichtlich in Rage reden.{/n} "Mein Auftrag lautete, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben und Euer Vertrauen zu gewinnen. Nun, das habe ich wohl erfolgreich zustande gebracht, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: « Après avoir passé cette nuit avec vous, j'ai envoyé un rapport à ma chaîne de commandement. J'ai alors reçu l'ordre suivant "Conservez la confiance {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}". » {n}Vous sentez sa colère monter à chaque mot qu'il prononce, comme s'il cherchait à s'énerver lui-même.{/n} « J'avais pour ordre de rester à vos côtés et de devenir votre confident. Eh bien, on peut dire que j'ai gagné votre confiance, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "After we slept together, I sent a report up the chain of command. Then, the order came in: maintain the Rogue Trader's trust." {n}Aggression builds up in Solomorne's voice with every word he says, as though he were deliberately riling himself up.{/n} "My assignment was to stay at your side and become your confidant. Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"

traits.locale_text: « Après avoir passé cette nuit avec vous, j'ai envoyé un rapport à ma chaîne de commandement. J'ai alors reçu l'ordre suivant "Conservez la confiance {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}". » {n}Vous sentez sa colère monter à chaque mot qu'il prononce, comme s'il cherchait à s'énerver lui-même.{/n} « J'avais pour ordre de rester à vos côtés et de devenir votre confident. Eh bien, on peut dire que j'ai gagné votre confiance, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: «Cuando nos acostamos, envié un informe por la cadena de mando. Luego recibí una nueva orden: ganarme la confianza {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente». {n}La voz de Solomorne suena más agresiva con cada palabra que pronuncia, como si se estuviese sulfurando deliberadamente.{/n} «Mi misión consistía en permanecer a su lado y ser su confidente. Bueno, yo diría que he logrado ganarme su confianza, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "After we slept together, I sent a report up the chain of command. Then, the order came in: maintain the Rogue Trader's trust." {n}Aggression builds up in Solomorne's voice with every word he says, as though he were deliberately riling himself up.{/n} "My assignment was to stay at your side and become your confidant. Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando nos acostamos, envié un informe por la cadena de mando. Luego recibí una nueva orden: ganarme la confianza {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente». {n}La voz de Solomorne suena más agresiva con cada palabra que pronuncia, como si se estuviese sulfurando deliberadamente.{/n} «Mi misión consistía en permanecer a su lado y ser su confidente. Bueno, yo diría que he logrado ganarme su confianza, ¿no?».

languages.text: “我和你上了床之后，向上级指挥部发了份报告。之后上级发来了命令，要我维持行商浪人的信任。”{n}索罗蒙说出的每个字，都让他的声音充满了攻击性，仿佛他在故意激怒他自己一样。{/n}“我的任务就是留在你身边，成为你的知己。你看，我得说，我顺利赢得了你的信任，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "After we slept together, I sent a report up the chain of command. Then, the order came in: maintain the Rogue Trader's trust." {n}Aggression builds up in Solomorne's voice with every word he says, as though he were deliberately riling himself up.{/n} "My assignment was to stay at your side and become your confidant. Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"

traits.locale_text: “我和你上了床之后，向上级指挥部发了份报告。之后上级发来了命令，要我维持行商浪人的信任。”{n}索罗蒙说出的每个字，都让他的声音充满了攻击性，仿佛他在故意激怒他自己一样。{/n}“我的任务就是留在你身边，成为你的知己。你看，我得说，我顺利赢得了你的信任，没错吧？”

languages.text: "Birlikte uyuduktan sonra emir komuta zincirine bir rapor gönderdim. Sonra emir geldi. Hür Tacir'in güvenini kaybetmemem istendi." {n}Solomorne'un sesindeki saldırganlık, söylediği her kelimeyle artıyor.{/n} "Vazifem, yanında kalıp sırdaşın olmaktı. Sanırım güvenini kazanmayı başardım, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "After we slept together, I sent a report up the chain of command. Then, the order came in: maintain the Rogue Trader's trust." {n}Aggression builds up in Solomorne's voice with every word he says, as though he were deliberately riling himself up.{/n} "My assignment was to stay at your side and become your confidant. Well, I'd say I succeeded in earning your trust, didn't I?"

traits.locale_text: "Birlikte uyuduktan sonra emir komuta zincirine bir rapor gönderdim. Sonra emir geldi. Hür Tacir'in güvenini elinde tut." {n}Solomorne'un sesindeki saldırganlık, sanki kendini kasıtlı olarak dolduruyormuş gibi söylediği her kelimeyle artıyor.{/n} "Görevim senin yanında kalmak ve sırdaşın olmaktı. Peki, sanırım güvenini kazanmayı başardım, değil mi?"
